channel.title: Client Run.bat Doesn't work
channel.description:
When ever I try to run the client, the client doesn't show up but shows this in the cmd:
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/1bb446b282355e91bbda63529d4cb3c4.png[/img]
Here's the code in the run.bat:
[code]@echo off title ElementX Client V1.0 cd bin java -Xmx512m client pause[/code]

item.title: Client Run.bat Doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Ole_Kristian Ole Kristian
item.description:
@Ole_Kristian wrote:

For me, it seems like there is no problem with run.bat,
but with you’r client.

These two output lines are printed from the java virtual machine:

RS2 user client - release #317
Usage: node-id, port-offset, [lowmem/highmem], [free/members], storeid

Wich means that run.bat has done it’s job to launch the client, but the client is closeing, therefor run.bat is reaching it’s line “pause”.
It should also print an error if it could not find you’r client.class.

Have this client been working for you before?
Do you know how you’r client’s code goes?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Run.bat Doesn't work
